thread.title: 10 Jobs That Will Give You a Hot Body
thread.title_full: 10 Jobs That Will Give You a Hot Body

title: 10 Jobs That Will Give You a Hot Body
text:
10 Jobs That Will Give You a Hot Body Written by: Laurie Kulikowski 08/15/15 - 8:36 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (TheStreet) -- Are you sick of your desk job? Are you packing on the pounds by sitting in one spot for hours on end, typing away mercilessly on your laptop? And then, to make matters worse, you feel too tired to exercise afterwards? 
With the average office worker sitting at her desk on for 10 hours a day , it's no wonder the country is worried about obesity, diabetes and a plethora other issues related to a sedentary lifestyle. 
Glassdoor, an online job review Web site, came up with 10 professions with the most job openings that will allow workers to stay active while on the clock. In general people who make a living within these professions earn between $25,000 and $50,000 a year. Yet, think of the savings in health care costs and student loan payments that can be had if you could stay fit while you work. More Headlines
